title: AzhAzhi nIla taDangaNNa
sahitya:
P:  AzhAzhi nIlat-taDangaNNa mEni en ayyA kaNNayy ambara vAnavarun 
padamum pera Ashai koNDu nEshamadAnAranin aDiyEnin Ashai shollat-taramO
				(samaSTi caraNan)
tAzhAk-karuNai avaiyE dayaik-kaDalE tAnE tattuvamAna mOnam koL kalaiyE 
madhura madhurap-pullAnkuzhalUdu manOharanAghiya mOhana caraNA 
tayirkkum veNNaikkumoru tANDavamADiya daNDai shivam paNiyum tiru naTana 
dhavaLa vanam pozhi candira vadanA taghudi enumpaDi sundara nayanA 
tattuvamuTriDu paTrugaLaTra manattavar mecciDu paccai nirattava
